title: IELTS Study Guide: Quick Tips, Tricks, and Strategies
features: The IELTS test is hard and stressful, especially if this is your first time taking it.  This
short, easy to read study guide
can help first time test takers
know what to expect on test day.
This book will give you the tips, strategies, and information you need to prepare you for the IELTS test.  It covers the
Academic version
and
General Training version

of the IELTS test. Don't know which version you should take or what the differences between the versions are? That's in here too.  It also contains outlines of what to expect from the IELTS test as a whole and the individual listening, reading, writing, and speaking modules.  The breakdowns of the individual modules are useful, but the most useful parts of this book are the tips and strategies.  For each module (listening, reading, writing, and speaking) we have a lot of short, easy to follow tips and strategies. The book has
36 tips for the listening module, 25 for the reading module, 48 for the writing module, and 44 for the speaking module.
There are over
150 tips total
in this book.  With all the tips and strategies, I'm sure at least some of them will help boost your band score. And
if just one of the tips helps you get a better score, isn't that worth the price of the book?
The tips and strategies are the most important part of this book, but I know many IELTS test takers have a lot of trouble with the speaking portion. So, as a bonus, I've also included
speaking test practice questions
and
examiner practice scripts

so you can practice in a realistic way with a partner.  The format of this book is focused on giving you lots of information quickly in an easy to understand format. No fluff, just tips and information about the tests
so you can be ready when test day comes

About the Author
Larry Pitts is the creator of the popular ESL resource website ESL Conversation Questions and has authored several ESL resource books including
1,000 Conversation Questions: Designed for Use in the ESL or EFL Classroom
and
500 Grammar Based Conversation Questions
. He has also contributed to several resource books for Yonsei University and helped to create
ESL Worksheets and Activities for Kids
